snippet.title: HEIR OF LIGHT - Lore Trailer
snippet.description:
Join the Crusade!
CBT 12/19 ~ 12/28 PST

Darkness has overtaken the realm, and the world is in chaos. The only hope to restore light and order lies with you, an Heir of Light. Embark on a gothic crusade to renew a hope that has been lost for generations. Ready your weapon and journey to restore the light of the world!

Heir of Light Teaser Page: https://goo.gl/HT5exd
Official Forum: http://bit.ly/Heiroflight_Forum
Official Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/HeirofLightGAMEVIL/
